promptPrefix: write a 30-second video script for [PROMPT] [TARGETLANGUAGE] (Create an outline within 60-words or below 500 characters script is ideal for a 30-second video ad. Script includes an opening, narration, on screen text, calls to action, and other key elements to fit in the 30-second video script. Split it in 5 slides.)
title: 30-second video or 5 slide carousel ad
